author: IGN
description:
Check out this clip from Disney's Snow White, featuring one of the new songs from the upcoming live-action musical reimagining of the studio’s classic 1937 film. Disney's Snow White stars Rachel Zegler in the title role and Gal Gadot as her Stepmother, the Evil Queen. Disney's Snow White opens in theaters on March 21, 2025.

Disney’s Snow White is directed by Marc Webb, written by Erin Cressida Wilson, and produced by Marc Platt, p.g.a., and Jared LeBoff, p.g.a., with Callum McDougall serving as executive producer, and features all-new original songs from Benj Pasek and Justin Paul.
title: Disney's Snow White - Official 'Waiting on a Wish' Clip (2025) Rachel Zegler, Gal Gadot

author: IGN
description:
Post Trauma is a modern-day survival horror, inspired by genre-defining classics. You awaken to find yourself in a twisted reality full of mind-bending puzzles, breathtaking tension, and unspeakable nightmares. Will you find a way home? Learn more about the story of Post Trauma in this new trailer for the upcoming horror game. Post Trauma will be available on Steam, PS5 (PlayStation 5), and Xbox Series X/S on March 31, 2025.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Post Trauma - Official Launch Trailer | The MIX | Kinda Funny Spring Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description:
Action-packed gameplay and dancing. It's all here in this latest Bylina trailer for the upcoming action RPG. Bylina will be availbale on PS5 (PlayStation 5), Xbox Series X/S, and PC in 2025. Challenge Koschei the Deathless himself! Journey to the Far Far Kingdom, save your immortal soul and become a true hero in Bylina, an Action RPG with a heavy focus on skill-based combat and a deep narrative rooted in Slavic folklore and legends.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Bylina - Official Trailer | The MIX | Kinda Funny Spring Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description:
Meet Blade Phantom and see this formidable boss in action in this latest The First Berserker: Khazan trailer for the upcoming action RPG based on the DNF (Dungeon & Fighter) Universe. Blade Phantom is an amalgamation of ghosts who follow the orders of Charon, the gatekeeper of the Netherworld.

The First Berserker: Khazan will be available on PC Steam, PS5 (PlayStation 5), and Xbox Series X/S on March 27, 2025.

#IGN #Gaming
title: The First Berserker: Khazan - Official Fatal Encounters: Blade Phantom Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out action-packed gameplay against formidable bosses and foes in this Burning Sword: Death Sun trailer for the upcoming action hack-and-slash game. Burning Sword: Death Sun will be available in Q2 2025 on PC. Journey into an ancient martial world, where Zhang Yìxian, a top-ranked sword master, seeks to avenge his fallen master in Burning Sword: Death Sun.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Burning Sword: Death Sun - Official Trailer | The MIX | Kinda Funny Spring Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description: Here's your look at Phase Zero in this reveal trailer for the upcoming modern reimagining of the survival horror golden era classics. The story is told in a series like manner - each chapter stars one of the two heroes. Featuring pre-rendered backgrounds, fixed cameras and the DNA of the PSX masterpieces, it blends nostalgic design with modern quality-of-life improvements, while honoring its iconic roots. Phase Zero will be available on PC. A demo is coming soon.
title: Phase Zero - Official Reveal Trailer | The MIX | Kinda Funny Spring Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description:
Meet Jeff and Abore in this latest Double Dragon: Gaiden trailer which reveals a free DLC update will be available for the beat 'em up game in April 2025. The Double Dragon brothers return in this fresh addition to the iconic franchise. With roguelite elements, every playthrough is a chance at new action. Tag in with 2 of 4 starter characters or unlock 12 additional characters, each with their own special moves and playstyles. Online & Local Co-op.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Double Dragon Gaiden: Rise of the Dragons - DLC Trailer | The MIX Kinda Funny  Spring Showcase 2025

author: IGN
title: What wrestler will Big E play as in #WWE2K25? Presented by @WWEGames
